thread.title: John Legend Helping Chrissy Teigen Take Off Her Jewlery While Drunk Is Peak Relationship Goals
thread.title_full: John Legend Helping Chrissy Teigen Take Off Her Jewlery While Drunk Is Peak Relationship Goals

author: Kevin Smith
title: John Legend Helping Chrissy Teigen Take Off Her Jewlery While Drunk Is Peak Relationship Goals
text:
View this image ›
Emma Mcintyre / Getty Images ID: 10519408 2. The adorable couple had a bunch of cute moments at the awards show. Especially when John sang karaoke with Blue Ivy and a bunch of other celebs. View this image ›
CBS ID: 10519451 3. But perhaps the most heartwarming moment that the couple shared was once they got back home. After enjoying some late night ramen, Teigen was tired and drunk. She didn’t feel like doing anything including taking off her jewelry. View this image ›
Snapchat / Chrissy Teigen ID: 10519453 4. So she said that John was in charge of helping her take her jewelry off. John helping a drunk @chrissyteigen take off her jewellery is my new favourite thing. Goals
— Nicole McCabe (@elocinbitch) ID: 10519462 5. They sat down on the floor and John carefully helped Chrissy free herself of her gold chains. View this image ›
Chrissy Teigen / Snapchat ID: 10520093 6. The whole ordeal seemed pretty painful because the chains got stuck in Chrissy hair…regardless, Chrissy made it out virtually unscathed. View this image ›
Chrissy Teigen / Snapchat ID: 10519588 7. Shout out to you John, you’re the real MVP! View this image ›
CBS ID: 10519480
